245:4: bodhisattvaḥ kila mānase mahāsarasi naikaśatasahasrasaṃkhyasya mahato haṃsayūyasyādhipatirdhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsarājo babhūva|
245:5: tasya nayānayaparijñānanipuṇamatirviprakṛṣṭagocarasmṛtiprabhāvaḥ ślāghanīyakulatilakabhūto dākṣyadākṣiṇyavinayabhūṣaṇaḥ sthiraśuciśīlavṛttacāritraśūraḥ khedasahiṣṇurapramādī samaravīvadhaviśāradaḥ svāmyanurāgasumukhaḥ sumukho nāma senāpatirbabhūva [āryānandasthavirastena samayena]|
245:6: tau parasparapremaguṇāśrayājjvalitataraprabhāvāvāryaśiṣyamukhyāviva pariśeṣaṃ śiṣyagaṇaṃ pitṛjyeṣṭhaputrāviva ca śreṣṭhaśeṣaṃ putragaṇaṃ taddhaṃsayūthamubhayalokahitodayeṣvartheṣu samyagniveśayamānau tatpratyakṣiṇāṃ devanāgayakṣavidyādharatapasvināṃ paraṃ vismayamupajahratuḥ|
245:9: evaṃ tābhyāṃ tadanugṛhyamāṇaṃ haṃsayūthaṃ jagadivaṃ dharmārthavistarābhyāṃ parāṃ vṛddhimavāpa|
245:10: tena ca tatsaraḥ parāṃ śobhāṃ babhāra|
245:15: atha tasya haṃsādhipateḥ sarvasattvahitasumukhasya ca senāpaterguṇātiśayaprabhāvavismitamanasaḥ siddharṣividyādharadaivatagaṇāstayoḥ kīrtyāśrayābhiḥ kathābhistatra tatrābhiremire|
245:20: tena ca samayena brahmadatto nāmānyatamo vārāṇasyāṃ rājā babhūva|
245:21: sa tāṃ haṃsādhipateḥ sasenādhipaterguṇātiśayāśrayāṃ kathāṃ prātyayikāmātyadvijavṛddhaiḥ sadasi saṃstūyamānāmasakṛdupaśrutya tayordarśanaṃ pratyabhivṛddhakautūhalo naikaśāstrābhyāsanipuṇamatīn sacivānuvāca-parimṛśyatāṃ tāvadbhoḥ prasṛtanipuṇamatayaḥ kaścidupāyo yena nāstau haṃsavaryau darśanapathamapi tāvadupagacchetāmiti|
245:22: atha te'mātyāḥ svaiḥ svairmatiprabhāvairanusṛtya nītipathaṃ rājānamūcuḥ-
245:25: tadyādṛśe sarabhi tāvabhiratarūpāvanuśrūyete tadutkṛṣṭaraguṇaśobhamiha saraḥ kasmiṃścidaraṇyapradeśe kārayitumarhati devaḥ,
245:29: prāyeṇa prāptivirasaṃ sukhaṃ deva na gaṇyate|
245:31: atha sa rājā astvetadityalpena kālena nātisaṃnikṛṣṭaṃ nagaropavanasya mānasasarasaḥ pratispardhiguṇavibhavaṃ padmotpalakumudapuṇḍarīkasaugandhikatāmarasakalhārasamūpagūḍhaṃ vimalasalilamatimanoharaṃ mahatsaraḥ kārayāmāsa-
245:50: tadevaṃvidhaṃ saraḥ kārayitvā sarvapakṣigaṇasya cānāvṛtasukhopabhogyametaddattvā pratyahaṃ sarvapakṣiṇā viśvāsanārthamityabhayadānaghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa-
245:53: atha kadācitsaṃhṛtameghāndhakārayavanikāsu śaradguṇopahṛdaśobhāsvālokanakṣamāsu dikṣu prabaddhakamalavanaśobheṣu prasannasalilamanohareṣu sarassu paraṃ kāntiyauvanamupagate praceyakiraṇa iva candramasi vividhasasyasaṃpadvibhūṣaṇadharāyāṃ vasuṃdharāyāṃ pravṛtte haṃsataruṇajanasaṃpāte mānasātsarasaḥ śaratprasannāni digantarāṇyanuvicaradanupūrveṇānyatamaṃ haṃsamithunaṃ tasmādeva haṃsayūthāttasya rājño viṣayamupajagāma|
245:54: tatra ca pakṣigaṇakolāhalonnāditamanibhṛtamadhukaragaṇaṃ taraṃgamālāvicaraṇakṛtavyāpāraiḥ sukhaśiśirairmṛdubhiranilaiḥ samantato vikṣiptamāṇakamalakuvalayareṇugandhaṃ jvaladiva vikacaiḥ kamalairhasadiva vikasitaiḥ kumudaistatsaro dadarśa|
245:55: tasya mānasasaraḥsamucitasyāpi haṃsamithunasya tāmatimanoharāṃ sarasaḥ śriyamabhivīkṣya prādurabhūt-aho bata tadapi haṃsayūthamihāgacchediti|
245:56: prāyeṇa khalu lokasya prāpya sādhāraṇaṃ sukham|
245:58: atha tatra taddhaṃsamithunaṃ yathākāmaṃ vihṛtya pravṛtte jaladasamaye vidyudvisphuritaśastravikṣepeṣu nātighanavicchinnāndhakārarūpeṣu samabhivartamāneṣu daityānīkeṣviva jaladharavṛndeṣu paripūrṇabarhakalāpaśobheṣu prasaktakekāninādotkruṣṭairjaladharavijayamiva saṃrādhayatsu nṛttapravṛtteṣu citreṣu barhigaṇeṣu vācālatāmupagateṣu stokaśukaniṣu pravicaratsu kadambasarjārjunaketakīpuṣpagandhādhivāsiteṣu sukhaśiśireṣu kānanaviniścasiteṣvivānileṣu meghadaśanapaṃktiṣvivālakṣyamāṇarūpāsu balākāyuvatiṣu gamanautsukyamṛdunikūjiteṣu prayāṇavyākuleṣu haṃsayūtheṣu taddhaṃsamithunaṃ mānasameva saraḥ pratyājagāma|
245:59: samupetya ca haṃsādhipatisamīpaṃ prastutāsu digdeśakathāsu taṃ tasya saraso guṇaviśeṣaṃ varṇayāmāsa-asti deva dakṣiṇena himavato vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma narādhipatiḥ|
245:62: ramante cātra pakṣiṇaḥ svagṛha iva prahīnabhayāśaṅkā|
245:63: tadarhati devo vyatītāsu varṣāsu tatra gantumiti|
245:64: tacchrutvā sarva eva te haṃsāstatsaṃdarśanasamutsukā babhūvuḥ|
245:65: atha bhodhisattvaḥ sumukhaṃ senāpatiṃ praśanavyaktākāraṃ pratataṃ dadarśa,
245:67: atha sumukhaḥ praṇamyainamuvāca-na prāptaṃ tatra devasya gamanamiti paśyāmi|
245:76: yato naitāvatā deva visrambhaḥ kṣamate kvacit|
245:79: gatvānubhūya ca tasya saraso guṇavibhūtirasaṃ na nastatra ciraṃ vicarituṃ kṣamaṃ nivāsāya vā cittamabhināmayitumiti paśyāmi|
245:80: atha bodhisattvaḥ prāptāyāṃ vimalacandrakṣatratārāvibhūṣaṇāyāṃ rajanyāṃ śaradi tena haṃsayūthena vārāṇasīsaraḥsaṃdarśanaṃ pratyabhivṛddhakautūhalena tadabhigamanārthaṃ punaḥ punarvijñāpyamānasteṣāṃ haṃsānāmanuvṛttyā sumukhapramukheṇa mahatā haṃsagaṇena parivṛttaścandramā iva śaradabhṛvṛdena tatrābhijagāma|
245:81: dṛṣṭvaiva lakṣmī sarasastu tasya teṣāṃ praharṣākulavismayānām|
245:84: ataściraṃ tadgatamānasānāṃ na mānase mānasamāsa teṣām||23||
245:85: tatra te tāmabhayaghoṣaṇāmupalabhya svacchandatāṃ ca pakṣigaṇasya tasya ca saraso vibhūtsā pramuditahṛdayāstatrodyānayātrāmivānubhavantaḥ parāṃ prītisaṃpadamupajagmuḥ|
245:86: atha tasmin sarasyadhikṛtāḥ puruṣāsteṣāṃ haṃsānāṃ tatrāgamanaṃ rājñe pratyavedayanta-yādṛśaguṇarūpau deva tau haṃsavaryāvanuśrūyete tadṛśāveva [haṃsavaryau] kanakāvadātarucirapatrau tapanīyojjvalataravadanacaraṇaśobhāvadhikatarapramāṇau susaṃsthitadehau naikahaṃsaśatasahasraparivārau devasya saraḥ śobhayitumivānuprāptāviti|
245:87: atha sa rājā śākunikakarmaṇi prasiddhaprakāśanaipuṇaṃ śākunikagaṇe samanvipya tadgrahaṇārthaṃ sādaramanvādideśa|
245:88: sa tatheti pratiśrutya taryorhaṃsayorgocaravihārapradeśaṃ samyagupalabhya tatra tatra dṛḍhānnigūḍhān pāśān nyadadhāt|
245:89: atha teṣāṃ haṃsānāṃ viśvāsādapāyanirāśaṅkānāṃ pramododdhatamanasāṃ vicaratāṃ sa haṃsādhipatiḥ pāśena caraṇe nyabadhyata|
245:92: atha bodhisattvo mā bhūdanyasyāpi kasyacittatraivaṃvidho vyasanopanipāta iti rutaviśeṣeṇa sapratibhayatāṃ sarasaḥ prakāśayāmāsa|
245:94: haṃsādhipatibandhādvyathitahṛdayā bhayavirasavyākulavirāvāḥ parasparanirapekṣā hatapravīrā iva sainikā divaṃ samutpetuḥ|
245:101: gaccha gacchaiva sumukha kṣamaṃ neha vilambitum|
245:110: naiṣa dharmo mahārāja tyajeyaṃ tvāṃ yadāpadi|
245:111: yā gatistava sā mahyaṃ rocate vihagādhipa||29||
245:113: kā nu pāśena baddhasya gatiranyā mahānasāt|
245:115: paśyasyevaṃ kamarthaṃ vā tvaṃ mamātmana eva vā|
245:120: kathaṃ nu patatāṃ śreṣṭha dharme'rthaṃ na samīkṣase|
245:122: so'haṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃpaśyan dharmāccārthaṃ samutthitam|
245:123: tava mānada bhaktyā ca nābhikāṅkṣāmi jīvitam||34||
245:129: api caivaṃgate kārye yadūnaṃ suhṛdāṃ mayā|
245:133: atha tau haṃsavaryau niṣādamāpatantamālokya tūṣṇīṃ babhūvatuḥ|
245:134: sa ca taddhaṃsayūthaṃ vidrutamālokya nūnamatra kaścidvaddha iti niścitamatiḥ pāśasthānānyanuvicaraṃstau haṃsavaryau dadarśa|
245:135: sa tadrūpaśobhayā vismitamanā baddhāviti manyamānastatsamāpannau pāśāvudghaṭṭayāmāsa|
245:141: tadupaśrutya sumukhaḥ pravyaktākṣarapadavinyāsena svabhāvavarṇanādhairyaguṇaujasvinā svareṇa mānuṣīṃ vācamuvāca-
245:142: śaktisthaḥ sanna gacchāmi yadidaṃ tatra kāraṇam|
245:146: atha sa naiṣādaḥ paramavismitamatiḥ saṃhṛṣitatanūruhaḥ sumukhaṃ punaruvāca-
245:148: tvaṃ punarna tyajasyenaṃ ko nvayaṃ bhavato dvija||43||
245:154: atha sumukhaḥ prasādavismayāvarjitamānasaṃ taṃ naiṣādamavetya punaruvāca-
245:158: naiva te duḥkhamicchāmi na ca baddho bhavān mayā|
245:159: sa tvaṃ gaccha yathākāmaṃ paśya bandhūṃśca nandaya||46||
245:161: no cedicchasi me duḥkhaṃ tatkuruṣva mamārthanām|
245:162: ekena yadi tuṣṭo'si tattyajainaṃ gṛhāṇaṃ mām||47||
245:164: viddhi niṣkraya ityasya na te'haṃ lābhahānaye||48||
245:166: māṃ badhnātu bhavān pūrvaṃ paścānmuñceda dvijādhipam||49||
245:167: tāvāneva ca lābhaste kṛtā syānmama cārthanā|
245:168: haṃsayūthasya ca prītirmaitrī tena tathaiva ca||50||
245:169: paśyantu tāvadbhavatā vimuktaṃ haṃsādhipaṃ haṃsagaṇāḥ pratītāḥ|
245:171: atha sa naiṣādaḥ krūratābhyasakaṭhinahṛdayo'pi tena tasya jīvitanirapekṣeṇa svāmyanurāgaślāghinā kṛtajñatāgunaujasvinā dhairyamādhuryālaṃkṛtavacasā samāvarjitahṛdayo vismayagauravavaśāṭsamānītāñjaliḥ sumukhamuvāsa-sādhu sādhu mahābhāga !
245:175: ko hi prāṇāpriyatare tavāsmin vipriyaṃ carat||53||
245:176: ityuktvā sa naiṣādastasya nṛapteḥ saṃdeśamanādṛtya haṃsarājaṃ samanumānayan dayāsumukhaṃ pāśānmumoca|
245:179: evaṃ suhṛjjñātigaṇena bhadra śaratsahastrāṇi bahūni nanda||54||
245:180: tanmā tavāyaṃ viphalaḥ śramo bhūdādāya māṃ haṃsagaṇādhipaṃ ca|
245:182: asaṃśayaṃ prītamanāḥ sa rājā haṃsāvipaṃ sānucaraṃ samīkṣya|
245:184: atha naiṣādastasya nirbandhāt paśyatu tāvadatyadbhutamidaṃ haṃsayutaṃ sa rājeti kṛtvā te haṃsamukhyau kācenādaya svasthāvabaddhau rājñe darśayāmāsa|
245:187: atha sa rājā praharṣavismayāpūrṇamatirdṛṣṭvā tī haṃsapradhānī kāñcanapuñjāvivaśriyābhijvalanmanohararūpau taṃ naiṣādamuvāca-
245:199: tenāsya vākyena supeśalena svāmyarthadhīreṇa ca ceṣṭitena|
245:200: tathā prasanno'smi yathāsya bhartā mayā samaṃ krūratayaiva muktaḥ||63||
245:202: tvadabhiṃgama iti nyayojayanmāṃ viphalaguruḥ kila mā mama śramo bhūt||64||
245:204: mamāpi hṛdi mārdavaṃ janitavān kṣaṇenaiva yaḥ|
245:207: tadupaśrutya sa rājā sapramodavismayena manasā vividharatnaprabhodbhāsurasurucirapādaṃ parārdhyāstaraṇaracanābhirāmaṃ śrimatsukhopāśrayasāṭopamupahitapādapīṭhaṃ rājādhyāsanayogyaṃ kāñcanamāsanaṃ haṃsarājāya samādideśaḥ,
245:209: atha bodhisattvaḥ kāla idānīṃ pratisaṃmoditumiti nūpurārāvamadhureṇa svareṇa rājānamābabhāṣe-
245:210: dyutikāntiniketane śarīre kuśalaṃ te kuśalārha kaccidasmin|
245:215: samavekṣayase hitaṃ prajānāṃ na ca tatrāsi parokṣabuddhireva||68||
245:217: upayāsi dayānuvṛttiśobhāṃ na ca viśvāsamayīṃ pramādanidrām||69||
245:221: adya me kuśalaṃ haṃsa sarvatra ca bhaviṣyati|
245:241: ityuktvā sa rājā taṃ naiṣādaṃ mahatā dhanavistarapradānena samānya punarhaṃsarājamuvāca-
245:242: imaṃ svamāvāsamupāgatau yuvāṃ visṛjyatāṃ tanmayi yantraṇāvratam|
245:243: prayojanaṃ yena yathā taducyatāṃ bhavatsahāyā hi vibhūtayo mama||80||
245:244: aśaṅkitoktaiḥ praṇayākṣaraiḥ suhṛt karoti tuṣṭiṃ vibhavasthitasya yām|
245:245: na tadvidhāṃ lambhayate sa tāṃ dhanairmahopakāraḥ praṇayaḥ suhṛtsvataḥ||81||
245:246: atha sa rājā sumukhasaṃbhāṣaṇakutūhalahṛdayaḥ savismayabhivīkṣya sumukhamuvāca-
245:247: alabdhagādhā navasaṃstave jane na yānti kāmaṃ praṇayapragalbhatām|
245:248: vacastu dākṣiṇyasamāhitākṣaraṃ na te na jalpantyupacāraśībharam||82||
245:254: saṃbhāṣamāṇe tu narādhipe ca sauhārdaramyaṃ vihagādhipe ca|
245:256: na heyṣa mārgo vinayabhijātastaṃ caiva jānan kathamabhyupeyām|
245:257: tūṣṇīṃ mahārāja yataḥ sthito'haṃ tanmarṣaṇīyaṃ yadi marṣaṇīyam||86||
245:258: ityukte sa rājā sapraharṣavismayavadanaḥ saṃrādhayan sumukhamuvāca-
245:263: tadiyaṃ prastutā prītirvicchidyeta yathā na naḥ|
245:265: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñaḥ parāṃ prītikāmatāmavetya snehapravṛttisumukhatāṃ ca saṃrādhayannavocadenam-
245:270: prayojanaṃ nāma kiyatkimeva vā madāśrayaṃ mānada yattvamīkṣase|
245:272: na citrametattvayi vā jitātmani prajāhitārthaṃ dhṛtapārthivavrate|
245:273: tapaḥsamādhānapare munāviva svabhāvavṛttyā hi guṇāstvayi sthitāḥ||92||
245:274: iti praśaṃsāsubhagāḥ sukhā guṇā na doṣadurgeṣu vasanti bhūtayaḥ|
245:275: imāṃ viditvā guṇadoṣadharmatāṃ sacetanaḥ kaḥ svahitotpathaṃ bhacet||93||
245:276: na deśamāpnoti parākrameṇa taṃ na kośavīryeṇa na nitīsaṃpadā|
245:278: surādhipaśrīrapi vīkṣate guṇān guṇoditāneva paraiti saṃnati|
245:279: guṇebhya eva prabhavanti kīrtayaḥ prabhāvamāhātmyamiti śritaṃ guṇān||95||
245:284: prajāhitaṃ kṛtyatamaṃ mahīpatestadanya panthā hyubhayatra bhūtaye|
245:285: bhavecca tadrājani dharmavatsale nṛpasya vṛttaṃ hi jano'nuvartate||98||
245:286: praśādhi dharmeṇa vasuṃdharāmataḥ karotu rakṣāṃ tridaśādhipaśca te|
245:288: atha sa rājā samabhinandya tattasya vacanaṃ saparṣatkaḥ saṃmānapriyavacanaprayogapuraḥsaraṃ tau haṃsamukhyau visasarja|
245:289: atha bodhisattvaḥ samutpatya vimalakhaḍgābhinīlaṃ śaratprasannaśobhaṃ gaganatalaṃ pratibimbenevānugamyamānaḥ sumukhena haṃsasenāpatinā samupetya haṃsayūthaṃ saṃdarśanādeva pareṇa praharṣeṇa saṃyojayāmāsa|
245:290: kālena copetya nṛpaṃ sa haṃsaḥ parānukampavyasanī sahaṃsaḥ|
245:291: jagāda dharmaṃ kṣitipena tena pratyarcyamāno vinayānatena||100||
245:292: tadevaṃ vinipātagatānāmapi satāṃ vṛttaṃ nālamanugantumasatpuruṣāḥ prāgeva sugatiṣṭhānāmiti|
245:297: evamayaṃ sthaviraḥ sahacaritacaraṇo bodhisattvena cirakālābhyastapremabahumāno bhavatīti|
